Puzzles & Brain Teasers.name: The Number Navigator
Puzzles & Brain Teasers.description: Test your mathematical prowess with this quiz! From square roots to averages, this challenge will put your numerical skills to the test. Can you navigate the world of numbers and emerge victorious?

questions.text: What is the square root of 81 squared?
questions.hint: First calculate 81 squared, then find the number that, when multiplied by itself, equals that result.

questions.text: What mathematical term is used to describe the average of a series of numbers?
questions.hint: This term is often calculated by adding numbers and dividing by their count.

questions.text: In the card game blackjack, how much are a queen and a king worth-together?
questions.hint: In blackjack, face cards have a specific point value, and you need to sum them.

questions.text: How do you express 3/4 as a decimal?
questions.hint: Divide 3 by 4 to convert this fraction into its decimal form.
